name: Mist Attunement 2
description:
Become one with the Mists and gain the following:
• The "Fractal Prodigy" title
• 5 agony resistance, 1% increased outgoing damage, and 15 health per second in fractals for every character in your account
• 1 additional fractal encryption and bag of fractal relics from the final chest in every fractal
Level 2 of 4—Effects stack with previous level.
